title: If you could be best friends with anyone from Camp Half-Blood, who would it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pretty much anybody there but here are a few of my favorites AnnabethPercyThe stoll brothersGroverThese 5 would probably be the top 5 people just based off my personality. I goof around a lot, and I find that guys can be the most amazing friends ever sometimes. But I’m also smart and competitive which is where Annabeth comes in. Me and her would get along great talking about strategies to win capture the flag or talking about buildings and talking about being architects.
